segments.text: My eyes keep returning to that precarious stool the boy is on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's only a two-step stool, but it looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are clearly splayed out at an awkward angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's quite high up, reaching for the cookie jar, stretching himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and that stool will definitely tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of fear just watching him balance so precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on the cookies that he seems unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors just frame his risky endeavor perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister nearby also seems oblivious to the potential fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a genuine accident waiting to happen right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I keep hoping he'll just grab his cookie and step down carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling and perhaps hurting himself is unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is wet too, adding another layer of hazard to the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene gives me a sense of anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He needs to be more careful, or someone needs to step in.
segments.speaker: PAR
